profile.name: John McNamara
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at RingCentral, Ireland | Passionate Developer with expertise in multiple programming languages
profile.summary: Results-driven developer with a strong passion for delivering high-quality software solutions. Proficient in various programming languages and experienced in contributing to open-source projects.
profile.company:
Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following employer for John McNamara:

RingCentral

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at RingCentral, Ireland
description: Led the development of multiple high-profile projects using Python and Rust.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable software solutions.
Mentored junior developers and contributed to the growth of the RingCentral team.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using Perl, Lua, and Python.
Contributed to open-source projects such as pytest_ctest and pandas_xlsxwriter_charts.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open-source projects, including inline-awk and excel-reader-xlsx.
Collaborated with other developers to improve project quality and scalability.
